testimonials.name: Vansh Arora
testimonials.text: Wow! Loved the branding, the colour of the bottles and the logo grabs all my eyes. Truly loved the branding. And product quality is also premium. I am using it on my car, activa and even in home.

testimonials.name: Prachi Tiwari
testimonials.text: I am a car lover, so I tried them as I loved their packaging. Products are good and feel premium. I bought the kit so get everything at a best price. Other brands are too expensive but I can say they offer somewhat same quality at a very affordable price according to indian market.

testimonials.name: Ridham Singla
testimonials.text: I've tried a bunch of car shampoos over the years, but this one really stands out ‚Äî not just because of how well it cleans, but because of cleaning satisfaction, thick foam and amazing fragrance.

testimonials.name: Sahil Mittal
testimonials.text: My car looked better than ever after using these products. Love them.

testimonials.name: Mridul Prabhakar
testimonials.text: I have been personally using it for my car and the results are very appreciative.

testimonials.name: Ojasvi Pawar
testimonials.text: I bought their product as their logo catch my eye. It brings the black shine back. It feels like I get a new activa. I am also using that dresser for my black nike shoes and it's perfect.

testimonials.name: Sukriti Mann
testimonials.text: Bought Car shampoo and silicon glaze dresser. Shampoo works really good, cleans effectively and makes thick foam. Dresser is also premium and gives black shiny finish. My black Kia Seltos looks new again now. Loved there products.

testimonials.name: Himanshu Singla
testimonials.text: Seeing my car all glossy and shiny after the foam washed off has to be the most satisfying thing everü´ß

testimonials.name: Himanshi Saharan
testimonials.text: Microfibres are so confusing to buy. They have so many varieties. So, I bought 3 diff ones 380, 800, 1200. The quality is really good. Leaves no water marks behind. Much better than the one I was using earlier.

testimonials.name: Khushi Chaudhary
testimonials.text: I tried their silicone glaze for my bike and car. Amazing results, all the black parts restored and shine is not even greasy.

testimonials.name: Rohit Grover
testimonials.text: Nice products, premium packaging, though my order delayed by a day but completely worth waiting.

testimonials.name: Saumya Chauhan
testimonials.text: Amazing branding, India is growing crazily. Premium car care products by an Indian. Feel so proud.

testimonials.name: Manan Madan
testimonials.text: I ordered microfibre, glass cleaner. But my home is using it instead to clean the home. Turned it into home care insteadüòÇ.

testimonials.name: Deepanshu Singla
testimonials.text: My car smelled so good on the inside after using them, for once I didn't feel the need to use an air freshenerüôÇ‚Äç‚Üï

testimonials.name: Dev Mittal
testimonials.text: Super easy to use with no mess, no hassle. Foams well, smells fresh, and rinses off without streaks. Perfect for quick, effortless car washes every day!
